#summary Game Compatibility List
#labels Featured

=== Mode Info ===
  Modes correspond to ini file HookMode option under InputHook section

  # Normal Mode - makes gamepad XInput compatible
  # Compatibility Mode - also change gamepad PID/VID and GUIDs
  # Full Mode - also change gamepad name to "XBOX 360 Controller"

=== Notes: ===
  # If not specified, game uses xinput1_3.dll
  # Most SEGA games do not display XBOX360 Controller buttons.
